name: TECHNOS JAPAN
info:
• 别名: テクノス
  • 别名: TECHNOS JAPAN CORP.
  • 别名: Technōs Japan
  • 别名: TECHNOS
  • 别名: テクノスジャパン
  • 别名: 株式会社テクノスジャパン
  • 生日: 1981年12月
  • 停业日: 1996年
detail: Technōs Japan Corp. (株式会社テクノスジャパン) was a Japanese video game developer, best known for the Double Dragon and Kunio-kun (which includes Renegade, Super Dodge Ball and River City Ransom) franchises. As of June 2015, Arc System Works owns the intellectual properties of Technōs Japan.
